thread.title: Lucrezia
thread.title_full: Espai Barcelona apartments evaluado por Lucrezia

author: Lucrezia
title: Lucrezia
text: amazing apartment fully equipped , clean , big , confortable and very quiet sited in a great position. Quick and easy access to metro and any other place you want to visit. The neighborhood is very vital with lots of supermarket ,shops and restaurants . We will certainly back again next time
